conformance.rmi

Class SkeletonTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • test.Test
      • conformance.rmi.SkeletonTest

  • public class SkeletonTest
extends Test
    Performs basic tests on the public interface of Skeleton.

    The tests performed are:

    • Both Skeleton constructors reject classes.
    • Both constructors reject non-remote interfaces.
    • Both constructors require the first two arguments to be non-null.
    • The skeleton can be started and stopped, and accepts connections while started.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private class  SkeletonTest.BadInterfaceImplementation
      Dummy implementation of BadInterface.
      private class  SkeletonTest.TestSkeleton
      Derivative of Skeleton which notifies the test when it stops.

      • ensureSkeletonRuns

        private void ensureSkeletonRuns()
                         throws TestFailed
        Performs tests with a running skeleton.

        This method starts the skeleton and then stops it. In between, it probes to see if the skeleton is accepting connections.

        Throws:
        TestFailed

      • wake

        private void wake()
        Wakes ensureSkeletonRuns.

      • probe

        private boolean probe()
        Checks that it is possible to connect to the server.
        Returns:
        true if the connection can be established, and false if it cannot be.

      • ensureNullPointerExceptions

        private void ensureNullPointerExceptions()
                                  throws TestFailed

        TestFailed - If null is given as a parameter but the correct exception is not thrown.
